title: No Icon on my account from the 10 year anniversary
body:
I dont want to sound impatient but its been a week, and i still haven't got the icon yet. all my friends got it in the first couple of days. I waited quite some time. I got gifted the mystery skin from riot because i already own riot kayle, but no icon.

skin recieved today: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/210424718283636737/227948727170629632/unknown.png
no icon last week: http://prntscr.com/ckhyp6
still no icon present: http://prntscr.com/ckhwj3

replies.body: There are a lot of accounts that are receiving accounts and the gifts are being sent out individually.  It will take some time to get to everyone, but you can stay updated through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight until this is all wrapped up!
Alright thanks for the information. also my bad, I thought everyone got their gift already.
